summary: DRIVER'S SEAT HEATER FELT VERY HOT IN ONE SPOT. THIS CONTINUED FOR SEVERAL WEEKS BEFORE THE SEAT HEATER STOPPED WORKING. I HAVE HEARD OF OTHER INCIDENTS WHERE THERE WERE BURN MARKS IN THE SEAT , BUT I THIS CASE THERE APPEARS TO BE NONE. I CONTACTED DAIMLER CHRYSLER WHICH REFUSED TO DO ANYTHING DESPITE THE FACT THAT THIS PROBLEM OCCURED TWO YEARS AGO AND WAS REPAIRED AT MY EXPENSE.
